alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 2:57PM MST until September 15 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Navajo County in north central Arizona... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 256 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Sunset Mesa, or 16 miles southwest of Winslow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... East Sunset Mesa, West Sunset Mesa, Jacks Canyon, and Sunset Pass. This includes the following highways... State Route 87 between mile markers 320 and 334. State Route 99 between mile markers 23 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
